wikipedia_page.main: Frederick William Chadwick (8 September 1913 – 18 September 1987) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League for Newport County, Ipswich Town and Bristol Rovers as a centre forward.

response: * 18 September 1987: Fred Chadwick, 74, was top scorer for Ipswich Town in their first season as a Football League team (1938–39). Manchester-born Chadwick also played for Newport County and Bristol Rovers as a centre-forward.

link_mentions.page: List of Ipswich Town F.C. seasons
